description.EN: Restores 30 HP to a single ally.
Restores 60 HP to a single ally.
Restores 10 MP to a single ally.
Restores 30 MP to a single ally.
Cures a single ally of poison and severe poison
Cures a single ally of paralysis.
Cures a single ally of confusion and sleep.
Cures a single ally of any ailments that afflict them.
Revives a single fallen ally and restores half of their HP.
Prevents a single enemy from using magic spells.
Inflicts a single enemy with a range of debilitating effects.
Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.
A small stone that can sting quite sharply if thrown with enough force. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.
A pongy deposit that can be pitched at one's opponents. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.
A sphere of the toughest stone that really hurts if it hits you. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle, including metallic monsters.

An unstable stone that explodes when it strikes its target. Almost kills a single enemy when used in battle, but the damage it inflicts will vary according to the target's resistance to instance death.
A meaty morsel that monsters love. Feed to a mosnter to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.
Suspicious meat of unknown origin. Feed to a monster to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor.
A tender treat that monsters adore. Feed to a monster to slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.
A piece of putrid flesh that exudes a sour stench. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you, but also poison it in the process.
Raises the defence of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its defence that cannot be exceeded.
Raises the max. HP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. HP that cannot be exceeded.
Raises the attack of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its attack that cannot be exceeded.
Raises the agility of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its agility that cannot be exceeded.
Raises the wisdom of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster has an upper limit to its wisdom that cannot be exceeded.
Provides a single ally with 3 additional talent points. Note that a monster can have a maximum of 999 available talent points.
Raises the max. MP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. MP that cannot be exceeded.
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to poison (Antioxidant trait).
Collectible medals that can be swapped with the medallist for an array of prizes. Drop by their counter in the Maulosseum in the lower echelon of the Circle of Conquest to see what's on offer.
A red crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.
A yellow crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.
Increases agility (+40) and max. MP (+30), and raises evasion (Artful Dodger trait).
Slightly increases max. MP (+10) and reduces MP consumption (Castslasher trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to confusion (Clear Thinker trait).
Slightly increase defence (+10) and improves resistance to sleep (Insomniac trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to instant death (Death Defier trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to fire (Frizz Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to water (Splish Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to explosions (Bang Ward trait).
Increase defence (+40) and improve resistance to explosions (Bang Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to electricity (Zap Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to light (Sizz Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to ice (Crack Ward trait).
Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to dark (Zam Ward trait).
Slightly increase defence (+10) and improve resistance to water (Splish Ward trait) and dark (Zam Ward trait).
Increase attack (+40) and adds effects of the Crafty Splasher trait (Crafty Splasher trait).
Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Banger trait.
Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Cracker trait.
Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Zammer trait.
Slightly increases attack (+20) and adds effects of the Crafty Zammer trait.
Very slightly increases defence (+10), agility (+10) and max. HP (+10).
Very slightly increases defence (+10), wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10).
Very slightly increases attack (+10) and defence (+10), and automatically restores the wearer's HP (Auto-Restora trait).
Increases defence (+30), and automatically restores the wearer's HP (Auto-Restora trait).
Very slightly increases wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10), and automatically restores the wearer's MP (Auto-Cadabra trait).
Increases attack (+30) and agility (+30), and raises the likelihood of performing critical hits (Critical Favourite trait).
Very slightly increases wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10), and raises the likelihood of casting critical spells (Critical Thinker trait).
Increases agility (+30) and max. MP (+30), and raises evasion (Artful Dodger trait).
Very slightly increases attack (+10), defence (+10) and max. HP (+10).
Slightly increases attack (+15), agility (+15) and max. HP (+15).
Very slightly increases agility (+10), wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10).
Slightly increases agility (+15), wisdom (+15) and max. MP (+15).
Slightly increases the amount of experience earned (Modicum of Experience = +0.3x).
Increases the amount of experience earned (Wealth of Experience = +0.5x).
Slightly improves the likehlihood of acquiring items (Scavenger = Unknown) after defeating an enemy.
Improves the likehlihood of acquiring items (Hoarder = Unknown) after defeating an enemy.

Slightly increases the amount of gold coins (Gold Panner = +0.1x) and experience points (Iota of Experience = +0.1x) earned by defeating an enemy, as well as improving the likelihood of obtaining an item (Rummager = Unknown).
Increases max. HP (+30) very slightly increases attack (+10) and defence (+10). Also improves resistance to explosions (Bang Ward), ice (Crack Ward) and fire (Frizz Ward).
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Frizzer trait.
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Sizzer trait.
Odd offcuts, the origin of which amy never be ascertained. Feed to a mosnter to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor. Occasionally inflicts a status ailment.
Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to stun (Granite Chin trait).
Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to earth (Crag Ward trait).
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Cragger trait.
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Zapper trait.
Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to paralysis (Fidget trait).
Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to wind (Woosh Ward trait).
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Woosher trait.
Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Splasher trait.

notes: Adds a chance for accessory tinkering to make a totally different accessory, including two exclusives to this mechanic - the Rational Ring and the Tingly Ring
Adds a chance for accessory tinkering to make a totally different accessory, including two exclusives to this mechanic - the Rational Ring and the Tingly Ring

description.EN: Improves the likelihood of a show of Force succeeding
